item.description:
Tax Day Tea Party on April 15 at the State Capitol in Hartford, and we invite you to please join
us.

We have been working hard with our co-sponsors, the CT Patriot
Alliance, and the CT Grassroots Alliance, to bring you a program that will
both inform and inspire you. As always, we are holding a family-friendly
event, so bring your family and your friends. We hope to see you
there!

There are also Tax Day Tea Parties taking place in Greenwich, New
Haven, and Norwich.

IT'S ABOUT LIBERTY! - SECOND ANNUAL TAX DAY TEA PARTY
DAY: Thursday, April 15
TIME: 2 PM to 4 PM
PLACE: Hartford State Capitol, North Steps
MAP/PARKING: http://www.hartford.g... .
The Civic Center garage (#1 on the map) may be your best bet; there is also metered parking around Bushnell Park, but check the meters carefully and note the time limits.

There will be tables, including one for CFL. Please inquire if you'd like to help. Thanks, Jim
item.name: Tax Day Tea Party - Hartford Capitol Steps
